includedAssets.title: Day 1
includedAssets.synopsis: On her final day with Danish police, a detective is forced to work with her replacement to find a missing young woman. Smash-hit Danish crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: On her final day with Danish police, a detective is forced to work with her replacement to find a missing young woman. Smash-hit Danish crime drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: On her final day with Danish police, a detective is forced to work with her replacement to find a missing young woman. Smash-hit Danish crime drama.

includedAssets.title: Day 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Horrific details of the murder are uncovered and dangerous connections are revealed. Lund decides to postpone her departure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Horrific details of the murder are uncovered and dangerous connections are revealed. Lund decides to postpone her departure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Horrific details of the murder are uncovered and dangerous connections are revealed. Lund decides to postpone her departure.

includedAssets.title: Day 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Hartmann finds himself in a difficult position with the media. Lund and Meyer turn their investigation to Nanna's school.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hartmann finds himself in a difficult position with the media. Lund and Meyer turn their investigation to Nanna's school.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hartmann finds himself in a difficult position with the media. Lund and Meyer turn their investigation to Nanna's school.

includedAssets.title: Day 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund reaffirms the promise she made to her fiancé as her suspicions focus on Nanna's classmates.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lund reaffirms the promise she made to her fiancé as her suspicions focus on Nanna's classmates.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund reaffirms the promise she made to her fiancé as her suspicions focus on Nanna's classmates.

includedAssets.title: Day 5
includedAssets.synopsis: New information redirects the police, Theis Birk Larsen grows weary of the lack of progress and seeks his own answers. Hartmann wins a new political ally.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: New information redirects the police, Theis Birk Larsen grows weary of the lack of progress and seeks his own answers. Hartmann wins a new ally.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: New information redirects the police, Theis Birk Larsen grows weary of the lack of progress and seeks his own answers. Hartmann wins a new political ally.

includedAssets.title: Day 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund and Meyer investigate the actions of one of Nanna's teachers on the night of her death. Hartmann is put under political pressure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lund and Meyer investigate the actions of one of Nanna's teachers on the night of her death. Hartmann is put under political pressure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund and Meyer investigate the actions of one of Nanna's teachers on the night of her death. Hartmann is put under political pressure.

includedAssets.title: Day 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund makes a choice which puts her relationship under strain. The police question their main suspect.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lund makes a choice which puts her relationship under strain. The police question their main suspect.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund makes a choice which puts her relationship under strain. The police question their main suspect.

includedAssets.title: Day 8
includedAssets.synopsis: The police make a crucial breakthrough, but a sudden change leads to some vigilante justice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The police make a crucial breakthrough, but a sudden change leads to some vigilante justice.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The police make a crucial breakthrough, but a sudden change leads to some vigilante justice.

includedAssets.title: Day 9
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund and Meyer begin to feel the pressure for results. Theis is arrested and Hartmann relaunches his campaign.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lund and Meyer begin to feel the pressure for results. Theis is arrested and Hartmann relaunches his campaign.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund and Meyer begin to feel the pressure for results. Theis is arrested and Hartmann relaunches his campaign.

includedAssets.title: Day 10
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund and Meyer find barriers within the police force, which Lund seeks to overcome, no matter the consequences for her career.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lund and Meyer find barriers within the police force, which Lund seeks to overcome, no matter the consequences for her career.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund and Meyer find barriers within the police force, which Lund seeks to overcome, no matter the consequences for her career.

includedAssets.title: Day 11
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund and Meyer are troubled by the reaction of their superiors after they uncover a new lead.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund and Meyer are troubled by the reaction of their superiors after they uncover a new lead.

includedAssets.title: Day 12
includedAssets.synopsis: Hartmann's interrogation opens up a whole new can of worms. Theis struggles to keep his relationship with Pernille alive.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hartmann's interrogation opens up a whole new can of worms. Theis struggles to keep his relationship with Pernille alive.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hartmann's interrogation opens up a whole new can of worms. Theis struggles to keep his relationship with Pernille alive.

includedAssets.title: Day 13
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund receives some difficult news while Hartmann deals with the increasing police and media attention.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lund receives some difficult news while Hartmann deals with the increasing police and media attention.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund receives some difficult news while Hartmann deals with the increasing police and media attention.

includedAssets.title: Day 14
includedAssets.synopsis: Hartmann's political opponent takes advantage of his situation, while Lund and Meyer pursue their own line of inquiry. Theis's emotional state worsens.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hartmann's political opponent takes advantage of his situation, while Lund and Meyer pursue their own line of inquiry. Theis's emotional state worsens.

includedAssets.title: Day 15
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund puts herself in a dangerous situation, while it seems the murderer may finally be revealed. Bremer looks to deliver the final blow to Hartmann.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund puts herself in a dangerous situation, while it seems the murderer may finally be revealed. Bremer looks to deliver the final blow to Hartmann.

includedAssets.title: Day 16
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund refuses to accept her colleagues' findings, and considers striking out alone. Pernille and Theis look to rescue their relationship.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund refuses to accept her colleagues' findings, and considers striking out alone. Pernille and Theis look to rescue their relationship.

includedAssets.title: Day 17
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund and Meyer battle the clock to piece their case together. Hartmann goes all out to win the election.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund and Meyer battle the clock to piece their case together. Hartmann goes all out to win the election.

includedAssets.title: Day 18
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund and Meyer's search for evidence takes an unexpected turn. Theis and Pernille prepare to move on.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lund and Meyer's search for evidence takes an unexpected turn. Theis and Pernille prepare to move on.

includedAssets.title: Day 19
includedAssets.synopsis: Things begin to pile up against Lund, while Hartmann engages in a dramatic debate. Pernille and Theis have a setback.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Things begin to pile up against Lund, while Hartmann engages in a dramatic debate. Pernille and Theis have a setback.

includedAssets.title: Day 20
includedAssets.synopsis: Lund is on her own, but more determined than ever. Hartmann receives some information which turns events on their head. Series finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A detective spends her final day with the Danish police working with her successor to find a missing girl, but as the case develops she finds it increasingly difficult to walk away. Smash-hit Danish crime drama starring Sofie Gråbøl, Søren Malling and Lars Mikkelsen.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A detective spends her final day with the Danish police working with her successor to find a missing girl. Danish crime drama starring Sofie Gråbøl.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A detective spends her final day with the Danish police working with her successor to find a missing girl, but as the case develops she finds it increasingly difficult to walk away. Smash-hit Danish crime drama starring Sofie Gråbøl, Søren Malling and Lars Mikkelsen.

includedIn.title: The Killing
includedIn.synopsis: Danish Detective Inspector Sarah Lund battles to solve gruesome, complex investigations in the face of her crumbling personal life, hostile colleagues and a suspect political class.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Danish Detective Sarah Lund battles to find the truth in the face of her crumbling personal life, hostile colleagues and a suspect political class.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Danish Detective Inspector Sarah Lund battles to solve gruesome, complex investigations in the face of her crumbling personal life, hostile colleagues and a suspect political class.

title: The Killing Season 1
synopsis: A detective spends her final day with the Danish police working with her successor to find a missing girl, but as the case develops she finds it increasingly difficult to walk away. Smash-hit Danish crime drama starring Sofie Gråbøl, Søren Malling and Lars Mikkelsen. Danish with subtitles.
shortSynopsis: A detective spends her final day with the Danish police hunting a missing girl. Danish crime drama with Sofie Gråbøl. Danish with subtitles.
mediumSynopsis: A detective spends her final day with the Danish police working with her successor to find a missing girl, but as the case develops she finds it increasingly difficult to walk away. Smash-hit Danish crime drama starring Sofie Gråbøl, Søren Malling and Lars Mikkelsen. Danish with subtitles.
guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex, violence
